pkgmetadata.longdescription: # polyswarm-apiAn interface to the PolySwarm Customer APIs.For an easy-to-use CLI tool, or as an example of how to use these APIs, please see [polyswarm-cli](https://github.com/polyswarm/polyswarm-cli)Supports Python 2.7 and greater.## InstallationFrom PyPI: pip install polyswarm-apiFrom source: python3 setup.py install> If you get an error about a missing package named `wheel`, that means your version of pip or setuptools is too old.> You need pip >= 19.0 and setuptools >= 40.8.0. > To update pip, run `pip install -U pip`.> To update setuptools, run `pip install -U setuptools`## UsageSee the [polyswarm-api documentation](https://docs.polyswarm.io/docs/polyswarm-customer-api) for usage guidance.## API ReferenceSee the [polyswarm-api reference](https://polyswarm-api.readthedocs.io/en/latest/autoapi/index.html) for API References.## Questions? Problems?File a ticket or email us at `info@polyswarm.io`.
